posts.post_content:
I've decided to thin out my Hall of Fame collection and am offering the cards here on the forum before going to eBay.  I purchased all of these with great eye appeal in mind so they present very nicely.  

Shipping is a flat $6.00 for priority mail regardless of how many cards you purchase.  Payment can be made via PayPal (please add 3% or mark as a gift) or via check/money order.  I will also be listing some 1930's, 50's and 60's HOF cards so check the other BST sections.  Please email me at [url]benlevinsohn@gmail.com[/url] with any questions.  Thanks!

T206 Rube Marquard (Hands at Thighs) – Graded VG 3 by PSA.  Piedmont back.  Price is $150.00

T206 Addie Joss (Pitching) – Graded VG-EX 4 by PSA.  Sweet Caporal back.  Price is SOLD.

T206 Clark Griffith (Bat) – Graded G-VG 2.5 by GAI.  Sweet Caporal back.  Price is $80.00

PM sent on the Addie Joss. Thanks.
Joss has been sold.  Price reductions on the other two!
